nodes.excerpt: Just as the Trello board revolutionized team collaboration by making it visual, simple, and fun for anyone, Trello’s new views are taking teamwork to places never seen before.

nodes.excerpt: Pageturner is a free community for readers and people building their reading habit. Reading in public and sharing your notes lets you discover interesting ideas and keeps you accountable.
nodes.title: Pageturner - Let's build a reading habit, together
nodes.author: Bruce

localize.description: Pageturner是一个免费的社区，为读者和人们建立他们的阅读习惯。公开阅读和分享你的笔记，让你发现有趣的想法，并让你负责任。
localize.tagline: 让我们一起养成阅读的习惯吧

localize.description: Pageturner是一個免費的社區，爲讀者和人們建立他們的閱讀習慣。公開閱讀和分享你的筆記，讓你發現有趣的想法，並讓你負責任。
localize.tagline: 讓我們一起養成閱讀的習慣吧

nodes.excerpt: We've built Seek a Guru to promote the positive sides of the Internet, that is connecting disciples with gurus virtually to enhance lives, knowledge and experience. Seek a Guru is a platform that will automate bookings, payments, security and integration.
nodes.title: Seek a Guru - Monetize your knowledge through mentoring
nodes.author: Tanjum 🔥

localize.description: 我们建立了Seek a Guru来促进互联网的积极面，那就是把弟子和大师虚拟地连接起来，以提升生活、知识和经验。Seek a Guru是一个平台，它将自动化预订、支付、安全和整合。
localize.tagline: 通过指导使您的知识货币化

localize.description: 我們建立了Seek a Guru來促進互聯網的積極面，那就是把弟子和大師虛擬地連接起來，以提升生活、知識和經驗。Seek a Guru是一個平臺，它將自動化預訂、支付、安全和整合。
localize.tagline: 通過指導使您的知識貨幣化

nodes.excerpt: You've been working on your project for months. You finally finished the product and now you need a name. You're exhausted from brainstorming and struggling to find a good domain. That's why we sell brandable domains with logos ready to go!
nodes.title: IndieBrands - Original domain names and logos for your startup

localize.description: 你已经在你的项目上工作了几个月。你终于完成了产品，现在你需要一个名字。你从头脑风暴中筋疲力尽，努力寻找一个好的域名。这就是为什么我们出售带有标识的品牌域名，随时可以使用!
localize.tagline: 为您的初创企业提供原创域名和标识。

localize.description: 你已經在你的項目上工作了幾個月。你終於完成了產品，現在你需要一個名字。你從頭腦風暴中筋疲力盡，努力尋找一個好的域名。這就是爲什麼我們出售帶有標識的品牌域名，隨時可以使用!
localize.tagline: 爲您的初創企業提供原創域名和標識。

nodes.excerpt: Anicons is a pack of stylish and playful 3D icons that can be used instantly in your projects. The pack consists of 30 high-res, well-organized and commonly-used icons that can be customized easily.

localize.tagline: 一包可定制的3D图标

nodes.excerpt: BlueReceipt is Text Marketing Automation for Shopify Brands. It's like Mailchimp X Slack built around text messaging your customers. Popups, Automations, and Broadcasts in a powerful dashboard. Get our free starter plan and start in < 5 minutes!
nodes.title: BlueReceipt - Text marketing customers love ❤️

localize.description: BlueReceipt是Shopify品牌的文本营销自动化。它就像Mailchimp X Slack一样，围绕着给您的客户发送短信而建立。在一个强大的仪表板中实现弹出式、自动和广播。获取我们的免费入门计划，并在<5分钟内开始!

nodes.excerpt: Kaleidoscope 2.4 features a new powerful integration with the Xcode debugger. Send any debugger command (ksp) or object (kspo) output to Kaleidoscope. This enables iterating over common development tasks quickly.
nodes.title: Kaleidoscope 2.4 - Compare debug output. Now with Xcode integration
nodes.author: Florian Albrecht

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特点是与Xcode调试器进行了新的强大集成。将任何调试器命令（ksp）或对象（kspo）输出发送到Kaleidoscope。这使其能够快速迭代常见的开发任务。
localize.tagline: 比较调试输出。现在与Xcode集成

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特點是與Xcode調試器進行了新的強大集成。將任何調試器命令（ksp）或對象（kspo）輸出發送到Kaleidoscope。這使其能夠快速迭代常見的開發任務。
localize.tagline: 比較調試輸出。現在與Xcode集成

nodes.excerpt: Chrome Extension using the latest AI technology to analyze huge amount of text in milliseconds and auto highlights the most relevant sentences. All for you to save time on web research and not being distracted and overloaded by non-relevant information.
nodes.title: AI Chrome Web Highlight - Auto highlights the important sentences on websites with AI
nodes.author: Talaal Max Habib

localize.description: Chrome浏览器扩展使用最新的人工智能技术，在几毫秒内分析大量的文本，并自动突出最相关的句子。所有这些都为您节省了网络研究的时间，而不会被无关的信息所干扰和超载。
localize.tagline: 用AI自动突出网站上的重要句子。

localize.description: Chrome瀏覽器擴展使用最新的人工智能技術，在幾毫秒內分析大量的文本，並自動突出最相關的句子。所有這些都爲您節省了網絡研究的時間，而不會被無關的信息所幹擾和超載。

nodes.excerpt: Meet Maya your virtual assistant for entrepreneurs. Maya will be running tasks, listening, and communicating on what you need to grow your idea. She will keep you up to date on your current progress and provide the next step you need to take.

nodes.excerpt: Based on the AI technology, we train the system to remove scratches and restore the old family photographs in one click. It is difficult to repair damaged photos without advanced PhotoShop skills. But now, you can do it like a pro with 3 steps!

localize.tagline: 修复旧的，损坏的照片和去除划痕在线。

localize.description: 會議欄在狀態欄中顯示你的日曆事件。一鍵創建和加入會議。無數據或個人信息收集。該應用完全免費，由開源社區提供技術支持。
localize.tagline: 眼前的會議

nodes.excerpt: Editable gives you the simplest way to make your videos intuitively annotated and easily marked up. Contrary to high-quality design editors like Photoshop’s paint brush or Final Cut Pro’s screen management, it just provides simple annotation experiences.
nodes.title: Editable - Annotate directly on any video files
nodes.author: Samuel alex 🔥

localize.description: Editable为你提供了一种最简单的方式，让你的视频直观地注释并轻松地标记起来。与Photoshop的画笔或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高质量的设计编辑器不同，它只是提供简单的注释体验。
localize.tagline: 直接对任何视频文件进行注释

localize.description: Editable爲你提供了一種最簡單的方式，讓你的視頻直觀地註釋並輕鬆地標記起來。與Photoshop的畫筆或Final Cut Pro的屏幕管理等高質量的設計編輯器不同，它只是提供簡單的註釋體驗。
localize.tagline: 直接對任何視頻文件進行註釋
